DataElement.preferredName: Follow-up Recurrence Death Patient Presumed Alive Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The Surv-Date Presumed Alive is the last date for which complete death ascertainment is available from the registry at the time a file is transmitted.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Follow-up Recurrence Death Patient Presumed Alive Date
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done._To come back or to return._The cessation of life._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The assumption that a person is still living._The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed.:To occur again.:The absence of life or state of being dead.

Concepts.definition: The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done.

Property.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:The assumption that a person is still living.:The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
